options.label: binom1
options.fig.cap: Probability that at least 1 individual in pond/product sample comes from a brood with reference samples

options.label: binom2
options.fig.cap: Minimum required sample size to be e.g. 99% sure the product sample contains at least one individual from a referenced brood

options.label: NP-seq
options.fig.cap: Effect of number of number of individuals sampled from the pond/product (colours) and reference samples per brood (x-axis) on A: proportion of true FS assigned as HS or U; and B: proportion of pairs assigned as FS that are actually HS or U, when 50% of pond individuals originate from a referenced brood. Note different y-axes.

options.label: propRef-seq
options.fig.cap: Effect of the proportion of individuals in the pond originating from a referenced brood, for a range of number of reference samples per brood

options.label: NP-pl
options.fig.cap: Pairwise likelihoods, effect of number of reference samples per brood

options.label: propRef
options.fig.cap: Effect of the proportion of individuals in the pond originating from a referenced brood, for a range of number of reference samples per brood. Using pairwise likelihoods, conditional on pedigree
